testcase.name: Upload image file
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the system correctly loads images files
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Click at Upload Image Files button

Choose an image file with the following extensions, one at a time and click "Open" button:

1. bmp;
2. jpeg;
3. png;
4. gif
step.expectedresults: A file with each one of the extensions listed are uploaded, one at a time

step.actions: Check if the image uploaded is correctly displayed at the image list

testcase.name: Check image file name at Image Name column
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the image files's name is correctly displayed at images list of Library
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Click at Upload Image Files button
Check if "Open" window is opened
Choose an image file and click at "Open" button
In the Image Name colunm, check if the name of uploaded image file is correct
step.expectedresults: The image file's name is correct

testcase.name: Upload non image file
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system prevents a non image file to be loaded at Library
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and word, excel, pdf files, among others types

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Click at Upload Image Files button

Choose non image file with the following extensions, one at a time and click "Open" button:
 
1. xls;
2. pdf;
3. html;
4. docx;
5. mp3;
6. exe;
7. zip;
8. bat
Check if none of the files above can be uploaded
step.expectedresults: None of the files above can be uploaded

testcase.name: Check if is possible to upload more than one image file at a time
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system prevents to uploaded more than one image file at once on Library
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Click at Upload Image Files button
Check if more than one image file can be selected using "ctrl" button pressed
step.expectedresults: It's not possible to select more than one image file to upload

testcase.name: Check sort of Image Name column
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the Image Name column correctly sorts the image files uploaded at Library, by ascending and descending alphabetical order
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded at Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Rest the cursor over "Image Name" label, the first column
step.expectedresults: The cursor changes from an arrow icon to a hand icon

step.actions: Click over it

Check if the image list is correctly sorted:

1. If the list were previously sorted by ascending alphabetical order, it must now appears at descending alphabetical order with descending bars icon at the left side of label "Image name";

2. If the list were previously sorted by descending alphabetical order, it must now appears at ascending alphabetical order with ascending bars icon at the left side of label "Image name";
step.expectedresults:
1. The image list is correctly sorted and the correct icon appears (descending with descending bars icon)

2. The image list is correctly sorted and the correct icon appears (ascending with ascending bars icon)

testcase.name: Check that only sortable column is Image Name
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if only column Image Name is sortable
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Rest the cursor over "Image Name" label, the first column
step.expectedresults: The cursor changes from an arrow icon to a hand icon

step.actions: Click over it
Rest the cursor over "Thumbnail" label, the second column
step.expectedresults: The cursor icon does not change

step.actions: Click over it
step.expectedresults: The image list is not sorted

step.actions: Rest the cursor over "Action" label, the third column
Click over it
step.expectedresults: The image list is not sorted

testcase.name: Validate Upload Image Files button
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the button correctly opens the "Open" window to select an image file when it is clicked

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Click at Upload Image Files button
Check if the "Open" window is opened

testcase.name: Verify Search field results
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the search field correctly brings the search's results
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded at Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu

Check if system correctly shows the result to the possibilities of search below:

1. Only with lowercase letter;
2. Only with uppercase letter;
3. Only with number;
4. Only with special character;
5. A part from the beggining of the img name;
6. A part from the ending of the img name;
7. A part from the middle of the img name.
step.expectedresults: The system correctly shows the result to all the listed possibilities of search

testcase.name: Check the layout of screen
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the layout of Library is according to the UI specification document
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Check is the layout is fully according to the requeriments of document "EM - Visual Guidelines"
step.expectedresults: The layout is fully according to the requeriments of document "EM - Visual Guidelines"

testcase.name: Check search results when fields content is erased
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the image list is correctly shown again when the search field has its content erased
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded at Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Type a text that returns a positive search in the Search field
step.expectedresults: The system correctly shows the result for the search

step.actions: Erase half of the text typed in the Search field
step.expectedresults: Half of the text typed in the Search field is erased

step.actions: Check if the result still appears in the screen
step.expectedresults: The result successfully still appears in the screen

step.actions: Erase all the text typed in the Search field
Check if the search result desappears and system successfully shows the Image List
step.expectedresults: The search result desappears and the system successfully shows Image List

testcase.name: Check placeholder of Search field
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the placeholder of Search field is correctly displayed

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
At Search field, check if the placehold is according with the Specification document
step.expectedresults: The placehold for Search field is according to the Specification document

testcase.name: Check search result for "@" character
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the system correctly respondes to the search "@"
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
At Search field, type the character "@"
step.expectedresults: The character "@" is typed at search field

step.actions: Check if the system shows "No records found" as result
step.expectedresults: The message "No records found" is successfully showed

testcase.name: Check if all thumbnails are clickable
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the thumbnails at the Library's list are clickable
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Rest the cursor over the first thumbnail of the list
step.expectedresults: The cursor icon changes from an arrow to a hand

step.actions: Check if the cursor changes for all the thumbnails in the list
step.expectedresults: The cursor correctly changes for all the thumbnails in the list

testcase.name: Check if all the thumbnails opens bigger image when clicked
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the thumbnails open its image bigger when clicked
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have images files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Rest the cursor over the first thumbnail of the list
step.expectedresults: The cursor icon changes from an arrow to a hand

step.actions: Click over it
Check if all the others thumbnails in the list open bigger as well
step.expectedresults: All the other thumbsnails in the list correctly open bigger

testcase.name: Check if bigger image from thumbnails closes
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the bigger image from thumbnails closes when user clicks outsite of it
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have at least one image file uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Rest the cursor over the first thumbnail of the list
step.expectedresults: The cursor icon changes from an arrow to a hand

step.actions: Click over it
Click in an area out the bigger opened image
Check it for the others thumbnails image in the list as well
step.expectedresults: The bigger image successfully closes for the others thumbnails image in the list as well

testcase.name: Check if page navigation bar becomes visible
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the navigation bar appears when there is more than five (5) image uploaded
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have six or more images files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Check at the end of the images list, if a navigation bar is showed
step.expectedresults: A navigation bar is successfully showed at the end of the images list

testcase.name: Check navigation bar functionality
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the buttons of navigation bar properly works
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have six or more images files uploaded in the Library

testcase.name: Check if page navigation bar becomes invisible
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if page navigation bar becomes invisible when five (5) or less image files are uploaded in the Library's list
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have five or less image files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu

Check at the end of the images list, if a navigation bar is showed

Check at the end of the images list, if a navigation bar is showed
A navigation bar is successfully showed at the end of the images list
step.expectedresults: No navigation bar is showed at the end of the images list

testcase.name: Verify if page navigation bar becomes invisible
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the navigation bar desappears when there is five (5) or less images uploaded
testcase.preconditions: To be logged in system and have five or less images files uploaded in the Library

step.actions: Click at Library on main menu
Check at the end of the images list, if a navigation bar is showed
step.expectedresults: No navigation bar is showed at the end of the images list
